Dialogue: Oh man, how did I end up here?
It stinks! And these people are so weird. They want me to do some ritual or something. There was one nice person, though. They said I had beautiful eyes. No one has ever said that to me before.
Maybe I can make it work here. Well, hopefully. A little scary but no going back now. Even if I did go back home dad would just hit me again and mom would take his side. They never listen.
I felt more love down here from one random person than I ever did back home with my own parents.
I might just go to that ritual. Just, you know, just to see how it works! How bad could it be?
